title: How to Create a VHS Tape from a Video File

steps.headline: Determine whether or not your graphics card can support s-video or composite video output.
If it does, plug your VCR input into the video card output.
Plug your sound card into the audio input on your VCR.
Set your computer to use the video out.
Open your media player in full screen mode on the video out.
Press the record button on your VCR.
Play the video on your computer.
When the video finishes, press stop on the VCR.

text: Determine whether or not your graphics card can support s-video or composite video output.  If it does, plug your VCR input into the video card output.  Plug your sound card into the audio input on your VCR.  Set your computer to use the video out.  Open your media player in full screen mode on the video out.  Press the record button on your VCR.  Play the video on your computer.  When the video finishes, press stop on the VCR.

Set your computer to use the video out.
